Ayesha Khan.description: attending classes at Oak Hill College library (conversing about amplifying marginalized voices and creating a space for underrepresented communities to share their experiences and engage with the local Black LGBTQ+ community by hosting a panel discussion, incorporating sign language interpretation at a poetry reading event, inviting Black LGBTQ+ activists to share their experiences, including workshops on allyship and privilege, collaborating with local Black-owned businesses and artists, involving young Black leaders, exploring the historical impact of systemic racism, and actively engaging with the community members to ensure their voices and concerns are heard.) @ the Ville:The Rose and Crown Pub:pub:microphone

Tom Moreno.description: collaborating with Carlos Gomez and Wolfgang Schulz to promote diversity and inclusion in the community (conversing about Adam Smith and Tom Moreno are discussing plans to boost creativity in the village, evaluating multiple candidates' platforms, organizing a community event to raise awareness about the election and promote diversity and inclusion, collaborating with Black-owned businesses and marginalized communities, involving youth in event planning, and reaching out to local community organizations for support in spreading awareness about the election.) @ the Ville:The Rose and Crown Pub:pub:microphone
